author.bio: I'm Chao, currently a Ph.D. candidate in the Statistics and Applied Probability Department at UC Santa Barbara with interests are centered in functional/object-oriented data analysis, deep learning, and time series.  I am advised by Professor Alexander Petersen.
author.name: Chao Zhang

group.title: Recovering probability densities from tangent spaces
group.author: Chao Zhang
group.excerpt: Now that we have a tangent space element, what to do to recover the probability density function?
